name: Plan P - Organic Vegetarian Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Protein-Packed Veggie Scramble: 3 organic eggs, 1/2 cup organic cottage cheese, 1 cup organic mixed vegetables (spinach, bell peppers, mushrooms), 1 slice organic whole grain toast, 1 tbsp organic butter
Breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs with cottage cheese and vegetables. Serve with buttered toast.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Greek Yogurt Parfait: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup organic granola, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 2 tbsp organic pumpkin seeds
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries. Top with honey and pumpkin seeds.

Lunch.details: Organic Lentil and Quinoa Power Bowl: 1 cup cooked organic lentils, 1/2 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic roasted vegetables (sweet potato, broccoli, carrots), 1/4 organic avocado, 2 tbsp organic tahini dressing
Lunch.instructions: Combine lentils, quinoa, and roasted vegetables. Top with avocado and drizzle with tahini dressing.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Protein Smoothie: 1.5 scoops organic pea protein powder, 1 cup organic almond milk, 1 organic banana, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Edamame and Nuts Mix: 1 cup organic edamame (shelled), 1/4 cup organic mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, cashews), 1 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 tsp organic sea salt
Post-Workout Snack.instructions: Toss edamame and nuts with olive oil and salt.

Dinner.details: Organic Tofu Stir-Fry with Brown Rice: 8 oz organic firm tofu, 2 cups organic mixed vegetables (broccoli, snap peas, carrots), 1 cup cooked organic brown rice, 2 tbsp organic tamari sauce, 1 tbsp organic sesame oil
Dinner.instructions: Stir-fry tofu and vegetables in sesame oil. Add tamari sauce. Serve over brown rice.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Cottage Cheese with Fruit: 1 cup organic cottage cheese, 1/2 cup organic pineapple chunks, 2 tbsp organic flaxseeds
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with pineapple chunks. Sprinkle with flaxseeds.
